name: BlackWarGrowlmon
effect: [Main] ＜Digi-Burst 3＞ (Trash 3 of this Digimon's Digivolution cards to activate the effect below.)・You may play 1 level 3 purple Digimon card from your trash without paying its memory cost. Any [On Play] effects on Digimon played with this effect don't activate.
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking][Once Per Turn] You may delete 1 of your other Digimon to unsuspend this Digimon.
